page.title: 18CHILDREN'S CLUBS, BENGEO
page.content:

{DANCING } 5 14 3 22 {DRAMA } 0 0 5 3 {MUSIC } 8 0 15 14 {SCOUTING } 50 50 51 41 {SPORT } 79 29 74 49 {YOUTH CLUB } 8 0 49 30 {CHURCH CLUB } 0 7 3 8 {NONE } 5 14 8 16
Figures show the % of 1st and 4th year children attending non-school clubs. { {SPORTS CLUBS}attended are:_ badminton, football,swimming,tennis,squash,Rugby, netball,keep fit,ju_jitsu,judo,karate, cricket,skating,golf,sailing and gym. {SCOUTING }A boy is a cub until he becomes a scout at 10\. Girls are brownies first, then guides.
